titleStmt.title: The Anabaptist preacher unmask'd in a further discovery of his lying vvonder out of Lincolnshire: as also The news from Richard Hobbs, an Anabaptist preacher in Dover, examined. Their juggles, lyes and deceits detected, by T·R·
titleStmt.author: Rudyard, Thomas, d. 1692.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Caption title on p. 3: The Anabaptist unmaskt, &c.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
